page.title: 04Local Issues in Thame
page.content: {Ring Road and Development} There is a new ring road due for completion soon which will link the Lea Park estate with Towersey Road. Many residents fear that the town will lose its identity if the growth is not carefully controlled. However, others feel that Thame needs to attract new industry. Planning permission has been sought for DAF Trucks and United Biscuits to set up their UK headquarters in Thame using the ring road development. {One school site} There has been a proposal to reorganise Lord Williams Secondary School to one site on the Oxford Road. Some people feel that this will enable a better use of manpower ond resources. Opponents feel that this might create a large im- personal environment for learning. The East site would have to be sold.
